page.title: 12Lemington First Nursery Unit
page.content: The Nursery has 60 children on its register.30 attend each day,some Mon.to Wed.,the rest Thurs.to Fri.. Children range in age from 3-4.All of the children attend a full school day,from 9a.m. to 3p.m..The unit has 3 staff,1 teacher and 2 nursery nurses,who help with the organisation and general duties.Children are involved in many activities such as counting,colour matching games and sand and water games.They draw and practise simple writing patterns,to learn how to control a pencil.They talk and learn new words.They bake and paint and make models.All of these skills will help them when they start the main school in September.Mrs Craven,the teacher said,"One of the most important things they learn is to share and to work together happily. They also learn to obey simple
